casebody.data:
No. 10-735. Philip Morris USA Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Deania M. Jackson, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated. 564 U.S. 1037, 131 S. Ct. 3057,

180 L. Ed. 2d 886,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4834. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Fourth Circuit, denied.

Same case below, 36 So. 3d 1046.
